title: LP插件lib问题
author: 王自如
txt_content:
我用lp插件 连接mysql 数据库 他会隔一段时间 刷
[luckperms-scheduler-worker-18] WARN me.lucko.luckperms.lib.hikari.pool.PoolBase - luckperms-hikari - Failed to validate connection me.lucko.luckperms.lib.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@64ec1363 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value.
[10:17:22] [luckperms-scheduler-worker-14/WARN]: [luckperms-scheduler-worker-14] WARN me.lucko.luckperms.lib.hikari.pool.PoolBase - luckperms-hikari - Failed to validate connection me.lucko.luckperms.lib.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@330c4d46 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value.复制代码
